To Top

Understanding

your project

As we embark on a new project for a new client, there are certain steps we must follow, before we even begin to create anything for the project. A project brief is a thorough document that provides an overview of the entire project including details about your objectives, how you qualify success, your USP, target demographic, personas, etc.

Web project

branding

From the launch of a new product, startup, presentation of a new brand through maximising selling opportunities – we have the experience to make you successful on-line.

IA & Web

Wireframing

When all yell, you cannot hear anyone. Priority setting is crucial. Not only from the aspect of architecture, but also visually. Everything cannot be of the same priority and uniform layout.

Before we start to think about the colours, graphics or type of scripts of complex website, web application, we work on the right information architecture and create wireframing documents.

Responsive

Web Design

There are numerous differences in terms of hardware options, display resolution, control or functions. We have created dozens of responsible interactive websites, e-commerce websites or complex web applications with an optimum experience on a large number of devices such as mobile device, tables, laptops or desktops with large resolution.

User Experience

for Web projects

Websites and web applications are becoming increasingly complex. Our UX experts study and evaluate how users feel when using the system. We deal with every detail to see how clear it is, for instance the filling in of forms, moving to further actions, clicking on buttons, transferring between screens, etc.

Constantly

Improving

Sometimes even a small change in the design, heading or structure can have a positive impact on your business. Be your aim greater number of orders, higher number of shares, longer time spent on the website, more registered users or any other aim – we can measure exactly if the change has a positive impact. Data acquired during the test speaks for itself.

Web

Development

Thanks to its unique approach focusing on every single detail, Design-Focused Agency PLATFORM was able to create websites and web applications that have received the most prestigious awards in the world. Using HTML5/CSS3, Java Scripts or Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) we are more than ready to give your visitors the possibility to enjoy content and to interactively engage in a story.

Content

Management

Based on experience with numerous non-flexible systems of third parties, our digital agency has created its own editing system focused on simple application. The editing system by PLATFORM enables you to significantly speed up and facilitate your website maintenance. Since people increasingly use portable and touch-screen devices, we decided to make our editing system responsive. This means that you can administer the content of your websites also on your tablet or mobile.

LET'S WORK TOGETHER

Have a project or design need in mind? Were her eto help. Contact us for a free consultation and guidance on the best way to tell your story. Thats what we do best.
